english.segment1: Don't be jealous. Don't be mad. We've got a lot to learn. We've got a lot to lose, so just take it back. Breathe slowly, come closer. You've got a pretty set of eyes now, Baby, and that's the reason why I chose you.
english.segment2: [Chorus: x2]. Don't scream at me, just breathe baby. Take me by the hand, take me by the heart. You'll never wanna' stop once the lovin' starts.
english.segment3: I've been trying to tell you all of the things that I meant. When I said "I do". I do. You play these games to get my attention. You wanna' start, stop, start, stop, All of the things you know we never should mention.
english.segment4: On our wedding day, this angel will grow her wings. And you'll never have to hear me say.
english.segment6: Oh baby you look so good when you move. I can't break it up, it just breaks me down.
